title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:attribute'
- Applies one or more attribute modifiers.

modifier.description: If specified, this modifier will be applied to its corresponding attribute.

modifiers.description: If specified, these modifiers will be applied to their corresponding attributes.

update_health.description: When true, the player's health percentage will update to match their new maximum health.
